Reviews.Title: Please DO NOT BUY this TV!!
Reviews.Author: Alissa Monique King
Reviews.Content: Not only does the sound suck on non-HD channels (you practically have to turn the volume up to the top notch just to get decent sound out of this thing), the device will stop powering on randomly. This is my 2nd TV (the first was brand new, and it stopped powering on after about 2.5 months. Toshiba eventually sent me a refurbished TV, which started having the same issues after LESS THAN A WEEK!!) and I am extremely dissatisfied with this product.

Reviews.Title: Known issues and Toshiba will not stand behind it
Reviews.Author: Kristen Northrup
Reviews.Content: Mine stopped powering on within about a year and another one just like it required a new board but was within the warranty period. If you read up on complaints it is clear they should be giving us all new tv's since they will not work as they are supposed to~!  The other one with the new board has been working correctly but to buy the new board is expensive.

Reviews.Title: pointless
Reviews.Author: Lacy
Reviews.Content: The tv did not work, then i could only get a refund if i sent it back, which i had to pay for, and it was going to cost more to send it back than i paid for the tv in the first place.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: courtney
Reviews.Content: order came in way before estimated date.. was better than described had a few little scratches and scraps but nothing on the screen of the tv and it works fantastic im in love
